Mr. THOMPSON of Pennsylvania. Mr. Speaker, I move to suspend the  rules and pass the bill (S. 222) to amend the Richard B. Russell  National School Lunch Act to allow schools that participate in the  school lunch program to serve whole milk, and for other purposes.

The Clerk read the title of the bill.

The text of the bill…

Mr. WALBERG. Mr. Speaker, I rise today in support of S. 222, the  Whole Milk for Healthy Kids Act of 2025.

For nearly 80 years, the National School Lunch Program has provided  low-cost or free lunches to children each school day. We know that  healthy diets can improve student success both in and out of the  classroom. Whole…

Mr. BOOZMAN. Mr. President, I am proud to join my colleagues in  emphasizing the importance of whole milk in a healthy school lunch and  taking Senate action to ensure a balanced diet for school-age children.

I rise today in support of S. 222, the Whole Milk for Healthy Kids  Act. This legislation,…
